		"@import \"common\";\n\n@import \"desktop/*\";\n\n// Import all component-specific files\n@import \"desktop/components/*\";\n\n/* These files doesn''t actually exist, they are injected by Stylesheet::Compiler. */\n\n@import \"category_backgrounds\";\n",
		"@import \"vendor/normalize\";\n@import \"vendor/pikaday\";\n@import \"common/foundation/helpers\";\n@import \"common/foundation/base\";\n@import \"common/foundation/mixins\";\n@import \"common/foundation/variables\";\n@import \"common/select-kit/*\";\n@import \"common/components/*\";\n@import \"common/input_tip\";\n@import \"common/topic-entrance\";\n@import \"common/printer-friendly\";\n@import \"common/base/*\";\n@import \"common/d-editor\";\n@import \"common/topic-timeline\";\n",
		"/*! normalize.css v3.0.1 | MIT License | git.io/normalize */\n\n/**\n * 1. Set default font family to sans-serif.\n * 2. Prevent iOS text size adjust after orientation change, without disabling\n *    user zoom.\n */\n\nhtml {\n  font-family: sans-serif; /* 1 */\n  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%; /* 2 */\n  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; /* 2 */\n}\n\n/**\n * Remove default margin.\n */\n\nbody {\n  margin: 0;\n}\n\n/* HTML5 display definitions\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\n * Correct `block` display not defined for any HTML5 element in IE 8/9.\n * Correct `block` display not defined for `details` or `summary` in IE 10/11 and Firefox.\n * Correct `block` display not defined for `main` in IE 11.\n */\n\narticle,\naside,\ndetails,\nfigcaption,\nfigure,\nfooter,\nheader,\nhgroup,\nmain,\nnav,\nsection,\nsummary {\n  display: block;\n}\n\n/**\n * 1. Correct `inline-block` display not defined in IE 8/9.\n * 2. Normalize vertical alignment of `progress` in Chrome, Firefox, and Opera.\n */\n\naudio,\ncanvas,\nprogress,\nvideo {\n  display: inline-block; /* 1 */\n  vertical-align: baseline; /* 2 */\n}\n\n/**\n * Prevent modern browsers from displaying `audio` without controls.\n * Remove excess height in iOS 5 devices.\n */\n\naudio:not([controls]) {\n  display: none;\n  height: 0;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address `[hidden]` styling not present in IE 8/9/10.\n * Hide the `template` element in IE 8/9/11, Safari, and Firefox < 22.\n */\n\n[hidden],\ntemplate {\n  display: none;\n}\n\n/* Links\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\n * Remove the gray background color from active links in IE 10.\n */\n\na {\n  background: transparent;\n}\n\n/**\n * Improve readability when focused and also mouse hovered in all browsers.\n */\n\na:active,\na:hover {\n  outline: 0;\n}\n\n/* Text-level semantics\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\n * Address styling not present in IE 8/9/10/11 & Edge\n */\n\n abbr[title], acronym[title] {\n  text-decoration: underline;\n  text-decoration-style: dotted; \n}\n\n/**\n * Address style set to `bolder` in Firefox 4+, Safari, and Chrome.\n */\n\nb,\nstrong {\n  font-weight: bold;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address styling not present in Safari and Chrome.\n */\n\ndfn {\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address variable `h1` font-size and margin within `section` and `article`\n * contexts in Firefox 4+, Safari, and Chrome.\n */\n\nh1 {\n  font-size: 1.7511em;\n  margin: 0.67em 0;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address styling not present in IE 8/9.\n */\n\nmark {\n  background: #ff0;\n  color: #000;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address inconsistent and variable font size in all browsers.\n */\n\nsmall {\n  font-size: 80%;\n}\n\n/**\n * Prevent `sub` and `sup` affecting `line-height` in all browsers.\n */\n\nsub,\nsup {\n  font-size: 75%;\n  line-height: 0;\n  position: relative;\n  vertical-align: baseline;\n}\n\nsup {\n  top: -0.5em;\n}\n\nsub {\n  bottom: -0.25em;\n}\n\n/* Embedded content\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\n * Remove border when inside `a` element in IE 8/9/10.\n */\n\nimg {\n  border: 0;\n}\n\n/* Grouping content\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\n * Address margin not present in IE 8/9 and Safari.\n */\n\nfigure {\n  margin: 1em 40px;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address differences between Firefox and other browsers.\n */\n\nhr {\n  -moz-box-sizing: content-box;\n  box-sizing: content-box;\n  height: 0;\n}\n\n/**\n * Contain overflow in all browsers.\n */\n\npre {\n  overflow: auto;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address odd `em`-unit font size rendering in all browsers.\n */\n\ncode,\nkbd,\npre,\nsamp {\n  font-family: monospace, monospace;\n  font-size: 1em;\n}\n\n/* Forms\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\n * Known limitation: by default, Chrome and Safari on OS X allow very limited\n * styling of `select`, unless a `border` property is set.\n */\n\n/**\n * 1. Correct color not being inherited.\n *    Known issue: affects color of disabled elements.\n * 2. Correct font properties not being inherited.\n * 3. Address margins set differently in Firefox 4+, Safari, and Chrome.\n */\n\nbutton,\ninput,\noptgroup,\nselect,\ntextarea {\n  color: inherit; /* 1 */\n  font: inherit; /* 2 */\n  margin: 0; /* 3 */\n}\n\n/**\n * Address `overflow` set to `hidden` in IE 8/9/10/11.\n */\n\nbutton {\n  overflow: visible;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address inconsistent `text-transform` inheritance for `button` and `select`.\n * All other form control elements do not inherit `text-transform` values.\n * Correct `button` style inheritance in Firefox, IE 8/9/10/11, and Opera.\n * Correct `select` style inheritance in Firefox.\n */\n\nbutton,\nselect {\n  text-transform: none;\n}\n\n/**\n * 1. Avoid the WebKit bug in Android 4.0.* where (2) destroys native `audio`\n *    and `video` controls.\n * 2. Correct inability to style clickable `input` types in iOS.\n * 3. Improve usability and consistency of cursor style between image-type\n *    `input` and others.\n */\n\nbutton,\nhtml input[type=\"button\"], /* 1 */\ninput[type=\"reset\"],\ninput[type=\"submit\"] {\n  -webkit-appearance: button; /* 2 */\n  cursor: pointer; /* 3 */\n}\n\n/**\n * Re-set default cursor for disabled elements.\n */\n\nbutton[disabled],\nhtml input[disabled] {\n  cursor: default;\n}\n\n/**\n * Remove inner padding and border in Firefox 4+.\n */\n\nbutton::-moz-focus-inner,\ninput::-moz-focus-inner {\n  border: 0;\n  padding: 0;\n}\n\n/**\n * Address Firefox 4+ setting `line-height` on `input` using `!important` in\n * the UA stylesheet.\n */\n\ninput {\n  line-height: normal;\n}\n\n/**\n * It''s recommended that you don''t attempt to style these elements.\n * Firefox''s implementation doesn''t respect box-sizing, padding, or width.\n *\n * 1. Address box sizing set to `content-box` in IE 8/9/10.\n * 2. Remove excess padding in IE 8/9/10.\n */\n\ninput[type=\"checkbox\"],\ninput[type=\"radio\"] {\n  box-sizing: border-box; /* 1 */\n  padding: 0; /* 2 */\n}\n\n/**\n * Fix the cursor style for Chrome''s increment/decrement buttons. For certain\n * `font-size` values of the `input`, it causes the cursor style of the\n * decrement button to change from `default` to `text`.\n */\n\ninput[type=\"number\"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,\ninput[type=\"number\"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {\n  height: auto;\n}\n\n/**\n * 1. Address `appearance` set to `searchfield` in Safari and Chrome.\n * 2. Address `box-sizing` set to `border-box` in Safari and Chrome\n *    (include `-moz` to future-proof).\n */\n\ninput[type=\"search\"] {\n  -webkit-appearance: textfield; /* 1 */\n  -moz-box-sizing: content-box;\n  -webkit-box-sizing: content-box; /* 2 */\n  box-sizing: content-box;\n}\n\n/**\n * Remove inner padding and search cancel button in Safari and Chrome on OS X.\n * Safari (but not Chrome) clips the cancel button when the search input has\n * padding (and `textfield` appearance).\n */\n\ninput[type=\"search\"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,\ninput[type=\"search\"]::-webkit-search-decoration {\n  -webkit-appearance: none;\n}\n\n/**\n * Define consistent border, margin, and padding.\n */\n\nfieldset {\n  border: 1px solid #c0c0c0;\n  margin: 0 2px;\n  padding: 0.35em 0.625em 0.75em;\n}\n\n/**\n * 1. Correct `color` not being inherited in IE 8/9/10/11.\n * 2. Remove padding so people aren''t caught out if they zero out fieldsets.\n */\n\nlegend {\n  border: 0; /* 1 */\n  padding: 0; /* 2 */\n}\n\n/**\n * Remove default vertical scrollbar in IE 8/9/10/11.\n */\n\ntextarea {\n  overflow: auto;\n}\n\n/**\n * Don''t inherit the `font-weight` (applied by a rule above).\n * NOTE: the default cannot safely be changed in Chrome and Safari on OS X.\n */\n\noptgroup {\n  font-weight: bold;\n}\n\n/* Tables\n   ========================================================================== */\n\n/**\n * Remove most spacing between table cells.\n */\n\ntable {\n  border-collapse: collapse;\n  border-spacing: 0;\n}\n\ntd,\nth {\n  padding: 0;\n}\n",
		"@import \"common/foundation/variables\";\n\n/*!\n * Pikaday\n * Copyright © 2014 David Bushell | BSD & MIT license | http://dbushell.com/\n */\n\n// Variables\n// Declare any of these variables before importing this SCSS file to easily override defaults\n// Variables are namespaced with the pd (pikaday) prefix\n\n// Colours\n$pd-text-color: $primary !default;\n$pd-title-color: $primary !default;\n$pd-title-bg: $secondary !default;\n$pd-picker-bg: $secondary !default;\n$pd-picker-border: $primary-low !default;\n$pd-picker-border-bottom: $primary-low !default;\n$pd-picker-shadow: rgba(0,0,0,.5) !default;\n$pd-th-color: $primary !default;\n$pd-day-color: $primary !default;\n$pd-day-bg: $secondary !default;\n$pd-day-hover-color: $primary !default;\n$pd-day-hover-bg: $tertiary-low !default;\n$pd-day-today-color: $tertiary !default;\n$pd-day-selected-color: $secondary !default;\n$pd-day-selected-bg: $tertiary !default;\n$pd-day-selected-shadow: $tertiary-low !default;\n$pd-day-disabled-color: $primary !default;\n$pd-week-color: $primary !default;\n\n// Font\n$pd-font-family: \"Helvetica Neue\", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !default;\n\n\n.pika-single {\n 1;\n  }\n  @return $ret;\n}\n\n// Returns a two-element list containing the normalized fraction and exponent of number.\n// @param {Number} $x\n// @return {List} fraction, exponent\n@function frexp($x) {\n  $exp: 0;\n  @if $x < 0 {\n    $x: $x * -1;\n  }\n  @if $x < 0.5 {\n    @while $x < 0.5 {\n      $x: $x * 2;\n      $exp: $exp - 1;\n    }\n  } @else if $x >= 1 {\n    @while $x >= 1 {\n      $x: $x / 2;\n      $exp: $exp + 1;\n    }\n  }\n  @return $x, $exp;\n}\n\n// Returns $x * 2^$exp\n// @param {Number} $x\n// @param {Number} $exp\n@function ldexp($x, $exp) {\n  $b: if($exp >= 0, 2, 1 / 2);\n  @if $exp < 0 {\n    $exp: $exp * -1;\n  }\n  @while $exp > 0 {\n    @if $exp % 2 == 1 {\n      $x: $x * $b;\n    }\n    $b: $b * $b;\n    $exp: floor($exp * 0.5);\n  }\n  @return $x;\n}\n\n// Returns the natural logarithm of a number.\n// @param {Number} $x\n// @example\n//     log(2)  // 0.69315\n//     log(10) // 2.30259\n@function log($x) {\n  @if $x <= 0 {\n    @return 0 / 0;\n  }\n  $k: nth(frexp($x / $SQRT2), 2);\n  $x: $x / ldexp(1, $k);\n  $x: ($x - 		"// --------------------------------------------------\n// Generic helper classes\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n// Floats\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n.pull-left {\n  float: left;\n}\n\n.pull-right {\n  float: right;\n}\n\n// Element visibility\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n.show {\n  display: block;\n}\n\n.hide,\n.hidden {\n  display: none;\n}\n\n.invisible {\n  visibility: hidden;\n}\n\n.sr-only {\n  position: absolute;\n  width: 1px;\n  height: 1px;\n  padding: 0;\n  margin: -1px;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);\n  border: 0;\n}\n\n// Affix\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n.affix {\n  position: fixed;\n}\n\n// Contain floats\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n.clearfix {\n  &:before,\n  &:after {\n    display: table;\n    content: \" \";\n  }\n  &:after {\n    clear: both;\n  }\n}\n\n// Overflow\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n.overflow-ellipsis {\n  white-space: nowrap;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  text-overflow: ellipsis;\n}\n\n// Clickable elements\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n.clickable {\n  cursor: pointer;\n}\n\n// Buttons\n// ---------------------------------------------------\n.disable-no-hover:hover {\n  background: dark-light-choose($primary-low, $secondary-medium);\n  color: $primary;\n}\n",

		"// --------------------------------------------------\n// Footer nav bar (displayed in DiscourseHub app and PWAs)\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n$footer-nav-height: 49px;\n\nbody.footer-nav-visible {\n  #main-outlet {\n    padding-bottom: $footer-nav-height + 15;\n  }\n\n  #topic-progress-wrapper,\n  #reply-control.draft {\n    bottom: $footer-nav-height;\n  }\n\n  #reply-control.draft {\n    margin-bottom: env(safe-area-inset-bottom);\n    padding-bottom: 0px;\n  }\n}\n\n.footer-nav {\n  background-color: rgba($header_background, 0.9);\n  box-shadow: shadow(\"footer-nav\");\n  height: $footer-nav-height;\n  position: fixed;\n  bottom: -$footer-nav-height;\n  left: 0;\n  width: 100%;\n  z-index: z(\"footer-nav\");\n  transition: all linear 0.1s;\n\n  .d-icon {\n    color: $header_primary-medium;\n  }\n\n  &.visible {\n    bottom: 0px;\n  }\n\n  .footer-nav-widget {\n    display: flex;\n    justify-content: \"space-evenly\";\n    @include unselectable;\n    button {\n      flex: 1;\n      margin: 4px;\n      border-radius: 2px;\n      padding: 14px 18px;\n      &:disabled {\n        opacity: 0.6;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n@supports (padding: max(0px)) {\n  .footer-nav.visible {\n    padding-bottom: unquote(\"max(5px, env(safe-area-inset-bottom))\");\n  }\n}\n\n@supports (-webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px)) {\n  body:not(.footer-nav-ipad) .footer-nav {\n    background-color: rgba($header_background, 0.7);\n    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);\n  }\n}\n\nbody.footer-nav-ipad {\n  padding-top: $footer-nav-height;\n  .footer-nav {\n    bottom: auto;\n    top: 0px;\n    background-color: $header_background;\n    z-index: z(\"ipad-header-nav\");\n    padding-bottom: 0; // resets safe-area-inset-bottom\n  }\n\n  #reply-control,\n  #reply-control.fullscreen {\n    z-index: z(\"ipad-header-nav\") + 1;\n  }\n\n  &.docked .d-header {\n    margin-top: $footer-nav-height;\n  }\n}\n",
		".conditional-loading-section {\n  &.is-loading {\n    padding: 2em;\n    margin: 1em;\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    justify-content: center;\n    background: $primary-very-low;\n    flex-direction: column;\n\n    .title {\n      font-size: $font-up-1;\n      font-weight: 700;\n    }\n  }\n\n  &:not(.is-loading) {\n    animation: fadein 0.5s;\n    -webkit-animation: fadein 0.5s;\n  }\n\n  @keyframes fadein {\n    from {\n      opacity: 0;\n    }\n    to {\n      opacity: 1;\n    }\n  }\n\n  @-webkit-keyframes fadein {\n    from {\n      opacity: 0;\n    }\n    to {\n      opacity: 1;\n    }\n  }\n}\n",
		".convert-to-public-topic .modal-body {\n  .instructions {\n    margin-bottom: 1em;\n  }\n}\n",
		".tap-tile-grid {\n  justify-content: space-between;\n  margin: 0.5em 0 1em 0;\n\n  .tap-tile {\n    color: $primary-high;\n    padding: 0.75em;\n    display: flex;\n    flex-wrap: wrap;\n    align-items: center;\n    border: 1px solid $primary-low;\n    margin: 0 0 0.5em;\n    cursor: pointer;\n\n    &:hover {\n      background-color: $tertiary-low;\n    }\n\n    &.active {\n      background-color: $highlight-medium;\n    }\n\n    .d-icon {\n      color: $primary-medium;\n      margin: 0 0.5em 0 0;\n    }\n\n    .tap-tile-title {\n      font-weight: bold;\n      margin-right: auto;\n    }\n\n    .tap-tile-date {\n      margin-left: 1em;\n    }\n  }\n}\n",
		"$card_width: 580px;\n$avatar_width: 120px;\n$avatar_margin: -50px; // negative margin makes avatars extend above cards\n\n.animated-placeholder {\n  height: 20px;\n  position: relative;\n}\n\n.card-avatar-placeholder {\n  width: $avatar_width;\n  height: $avatar_width;\n  border-radius: 100%;\n  position: relative;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  &:before {\n    animation: placeHolderShimmer 4s linear infinite forwards;\n    position: absolute;\n    left: 0;\n    content: \"\";\n    background: linear-gradient(\n      to right,\n      $primary-very-low 10%,\n      $primary-low 18%,\n      $primary-very-low 33%\n    );\n    height: $avatar_width;\n    width: $card_width;\n  }\n}\n\n// shared styles for user and group cards\n.user-card,\n.group-card {\n  width: $card_width;\n  box-shadow: shadow(\"card\");\n  color: $primary;\n  background: $secondary center center;\n  background-size: cover;\n  transition: opacity 0.2s, transform 0.2s;\n  -webkit-transition: opacity 0.2s, -webkit-transform 0.2s;\n  opacity: 0;\n  @include transform(scale(0.9));\n  &.show {\n    opacity: 1;\n    @include transform(scale(1));\n  }\n  .card-content {\n    padding: 10px;\n    background: rgba($secondary, 0.85);\n    margin-top: 80px;\n    &:after {\n      content: \"\";\n      display: block;\n      clear: both;\n    }\n    a.card-huge-avatar {\n      outline: none;\n    }\n  }\n  &.no-bg {\n    .card-content {\n      margin-top: 0;\n    }\n  }\n  .card-row:not(.first-row) {\n    margin-top: 0.5em;\n  }\n  // avatar - names - controls\n  .first-row {\n    .names {\n      padding-left: 1.25em;\n\n      .user-profile-link {\n        display: flex;\n        align-items: center;\n      }\n\n      .d-icon {\n        margin: 0 0.25em;\n      }\n\n      .name-username-wrapper {\n        margin-right: 0;\n        flex: 0 1 auto;\n      }\n      span {\n        display: block;\n      }\n    }\n    .usercard-controls {\n      list-style-type: none;\n      margin: 0;\n      button {\n        width: 100%;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  .btn {\n    margin-bottom: 5px;\n  }\n  h1 {\n    line-height: $line-height-medium;\n    .d-icon {\n      color: $primary;\n    }\n  }\n  h3 {\n    display: inline;\n    margin-right: 0.5em;\n    color: $primary;\n    &.email,\n    .desc,\n    a {\n      color: $primary-high;\n    }\n  }\n  h1,\n  h2,\n  h3 {\n    margin: 0;\n    @include ellipsis;\n  }\n  h1,\n  h2 {\n    a {\n      color: $primary;\n    }\n  }\n  h2,\n  h3 {\n    font-weight: normal;\n  }\n  p {\n    margin: 0 0 5px 0;\n  }\n}\n\n// styles for user cards only\n.user-card {\n  // avatar - names - controls\n  .first-row {\n    display: flex;\n    .avatar-placeholder {\n      width: $avatar_width;\n      height: $avatar_width;\n    }\n    .user-card-avatar {\n      margin-top: $avatar_margin;\n    }\n    .new-user a {\n      color: $primary-low-mid;\n    }\n  }\n  // user bio - suspension reason\n  .second-row {\n    max-height: 150px;\n    overflow: auto;\n    .bio {\n      a {\n        color: $primary;\n        text-decoration: underline;\n      }\n      a.mention {\n        text-decoration: none;\n      }\n      .overflow {\n        max-height: 60px;\n        overflow: hidden;\n      }\n    }\n    .suspended {\n      color: $danger;\n      .suspension-reason-title,\n      .suspension-date {\n        font-weight: bold;\n      }\n    }\n    .profile-hidden {\n      font-size: $font-up-1;\n      margin-top: 0.5em;\n    }\n  }\n  // featured topic\n  .featured-topic {\n    .desc {\n      color: $primary-high;\n    }\n    a {\n      color: $primary;\n      text-decoration: underline;\n    }\n  }\n\n  // location and website\n  .location-and-website {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-wrap: wrap;\n    width: 100%;\n    align-items: center;\n    .location,\n    .website-name {\n      display: flex;\n      overflow: hidden;\n      align-items: center;\n      .d-icon {\n        margin-right: 0.25em;\n      }\n    }\n    .website-name a,\n    .location span {\n      @include ellipsis;\n      color: $primary;\n    }\n    .location,\n    .local-time,\n    .website-name {\n      margin-right: 0.5em;\n    }\n    .website-name a {\n      text-decoration: underline;\n    }\n  }\n  // custom user fields\n  .public-user-fields {\n    margin: 0;\n  }\n\n  // badges\n  .badge-section {\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: flex-start;\n    .user-badge {\n      @include ellipsis;\n      background: $primary-very-low;\n      border: 1px solid $primary-low;\n      color: $primary;\n    }\n    .more-user-badges {\n      a {\n        @extend .user-badge;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n// styles for group cards only\n.group-card {\n  // avatar - names and controls\n  .first-row {\n    display: flex;\n    .group-card-avatar {\n      margin-top: $avatar_margin;\n    }\n    .avatar-flair {\n      display: flex;\n      background-size: contain;\n      background-repeat: no-repeat;\n      width: $avatar_width;\n      height: $avatar_width;\n      color: $primary;\n      .d-icon {\n        margin: auto;\n        font-size: $avatar_width / 1.5;\n      }\n      &.rounded {\n        border-radius: 50%;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  // group bio\n  .second-row {\n    max-height: 150px;\n    overflow: auto;\n    .bio {\n      a {\n        color: $primary;\n        text-decoration: underline;\n      }\n      img {\n        max-width: 100%;\n        height: auto;\n      }\n      a.mention {\n        text-decoration: none;\n      }\n      .overflow {\n        max-height: 60px;\n        overflow: hidden;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n",
		"// Common styles for \"user-info\" component\n.user-info {\n  display: inline-block;\n  clear: both;\n  margin-bottom: 1em;\n\n  .user-image {\n    float: left;\n    padding-right: 4px;\n    margin-right: 10px;\n  }\n\n  .user-image-inner {\n    position: relative;\n    display: inline-block;\n  }\n\n  .user-detail {\n    float: left;\n    width: 70%;\n    padding-left: 5px;\n    @media screen and (max-width: 600px) {\n      font-size: $font-down-1;\n    }\n\n    .name-line {\n      @include ellipsis;\n    }\n\n    .username a {\n      font-weight: bold;\n      color: dark-light-choose($primary-high, $secondary-low);\n    }\n\n    .name {\n      margin-left: 5px;\n      color: dark-light-choose($primary-high, $secondary-low);\n    }\n\n    .title {\n      margin-top: 3px;\n      color: dark-light-choose($primary-medium, $secondary-medium);\n    }\n  }\n\n  &.small {\n    width: 333px;\n    @media screen and (max-width: $small-width) {\n      width: auto;\n      display: flex;\n    }\n    @media screen and (max-width: 600px) {\n      width: 100%;\n    }\n  }\n\n  &.medium {\n    min-height: 60px;\n\n    .username,\n    .name {\n      display: block;\n    }\n\n    .name {\n      margin-left: 0;\n    }\n\n    &.badge-info {\n      min-height: 80px;\n      min-width: 250px;\n\n      .granted-on {\n        color: dark-light-choose($primary-medium, $secondary-medium);\n      }\n\n      .post-link {\n        display: block;\n        margin-top: 0.2em;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n",
		".user-stream {\n  &.filter-deleted {\n    grid-column-start: 1;\n    grid-column-end: 3;\n    grid-row-start: 2;\n  }\n}\n",
		".share-and-invite.modal {\n  .modal-body {\n    max-width: 475px;\n    min-width: 320px;\n    padding: 0;\n  }\n\n  .modal-panel {\n    padding: 0.667em;\n  }\n\n  .modal-header {\n    .modal-close {\n      padding-left: 0;\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n.share-and-invite.modal .share.modal-panel {\n  .header {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: row;\n    align-items: center;\n\n    .title {\n      font-size: $font-0;\n      font-weight: normal;\n      margin-bottom: 8px;\n\n      .post-date {\n        color: $primary-medium;\n        font-size: $font-down-1;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  .body {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: column;\n\n    .topic-share-url {\n      width: 100%;\n      height: auto;\n      box-sizing: border-box;\n    }\n\n    .topic-share-url {\n      margin-bottom: 8px;\n    }\n\n    .sources {\n      display: flex;\n      align-items: center;\n      flex-wrap: wrap;\n      flex-direction: row;\n\n      .social-link {\n        font-size: $font-up-6;\n        margin-right: 8px;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n\n.share-and-invite.modal .invite.modal-panel {\n  .error-message,\n  .success-message {\n    margin-bottom: 8px;\n  }\n\n  .body {\n    .invite-user-control,\n    .group-access-control,\n    .show-custom-message-control {\n      margin-bottom: 8px;\n    }\n\n    .instructions {\n      margin-bottom: 8px;\n    }\n\n    .email-or-username-input {\n      width: 100%;\n    }\n\n    .invite-user-input-wrapper {\n      display: flex;\n      div.ac-wrap {\n        flex: 1;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  .footer {\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n\n    .btn-primary {\n      margin-right: 8px;\n\n      &:last-child {\n        margin-right: 0;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n",
		"@import \"foundation/variables\";\n@import \"foundation/mixins\";\n\n.popup-tip {\n  position: absolute;\n  display: block;\n  padding: 5px 10px;\n  z-index: z(\"tooltip\");\n  &.bad {\n    background: $danger-medium;\n    color: white;\n    box-shadow: shadow(\"dropdown\");\n  }\n  &.hide,\n  &.good {\n    display: none;\n  }\n  .close {\n    float: right;\n    color: $primary;\n    opacity: 0.5;\n    font-size: $font-0;\n    margin: 0 0 0 4px;\n    cursor: pointer;\n  }\n  .close:hover {\n    opacity: 1;\n  }\n}\n",
		"// --------------------------------------------------\n// Variables used throughout the theme\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n// Layout dimensions\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n$small-width: 800px !default;\n$medium-width: 995px !default;\n$large-width: 1110px !default;\n\n$input-padding: 4px 10px;\n$topic-body-width: 690px;\n$topic-body-width-padding: 11px;\n$topic-avatar-width: 45px;\n\n// Brand color variables\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n$google: #ffffff !default;\n$instagram: #e1306c !default;\n$facebook: #4267b2 !default;\n$cas: #70ba61 !default;\n$twitter: #1da1f2 !default;\n$github: #100e0f !default;\n$discord: #7289da !default;\n\n// Badge color variables\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n$gold: rgb(231, 195, 0) !default;\n$silver: #c0c0c0 !default;\n$bronze: #cd7f32 !default;\n\n// Fonts\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n$base-font-size-smaller: 0.875em !default; // eq. to 14px\n$base-font-size: 0.938em !default; // eq. to 15px\n$base-font-size-larger: 1.063em !default; // eq. to 17px\n$base-font-size-largest: 1.118em !default; // eq. to 19px\n$base-font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !default;\n\n// Font-size defintions, multiplier ^ (step / interval)\n$font-up-6: 2.296em;\n$font-up-5: 2em;\n$font-up-4: 1.7511em;\n$font-up-3: 1.5157em;\n$font-up-2: 1.3195em;\n$font-up-1: 1.1487em; // 2^(1/5)\n$font-0: 1em;\n$font-down-1: 0.8706em; // 2^(-1/5)\n$font-down-2: 0.7579em; // Smallest size we use based on the 1em base\n$font-down-3: 0.6599em;\n$font-down-4: 0.5745em;\n$font-down-5: 0.5em;\n$font-down-6: 0.4355em;\n\n// inputs/textareas in iOS need to be at least 16px to avoid triggering zoom on focus\n// with base at 15px, the below gives 16.05px\n$font-size-ios-input: 1.07em;\n\n// Common line-heights\n$line-height-small: 1;\n$line-height-medium: 1.2; // Headings or large text\n$line-height-large: 1.4; // Normal or small text\n\n// These files don''t actually exist. They''re injected by Stylesheet::Compiler.\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n@import \"theme_colors\";\n@import \"plugins_variables\";\n@import \"common/foundation/math\";\n\n// Z-index\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n$z-layers: (\n  \"max\": 9999,\n  \"modal\": (\n    \"tooltip\": 1600,\n    \"popover\": 1500,\n    \"dropdown\": 1400,\n    \"content\": 1300,\n    \"overlay\": 1200\n  ),\n  \"fullscreen\": 1150,\n  \"mobile-composer\": 1100,\n  \"ipad-header-nav\": 1020,\n  \"header\": 1000,\n  \"footer-nav\": 900,\n  \"tooltip\": 600,\n  \"composer\": (\n    \"dropdown\": 700,\n    \"tooltip\": 600,\n    \"popover\": 500,\n    \"content\": 400\n  ),\n  \"dropdown\": 300,\n  \"usercard\": 200,\n  \"timeline\": 100,\n  \"base\": 1\n);\n\n@function map-has-nested-keys($map, $keys...) {\n  @each $key in $keys {\n    @if not map-has-key($map, $key) {\n      @return false;\n    }\n    $map: map-get($map, $key);\n  }\n  @return true;\n}\n\n@function map-deep-get($map, $keys...) {\n  @each $key in $keys {\n    $map: map-get($map, $key);\n  }\n  @return $map;\n}\n\n@function z($layers...) {\n  @if not map-has-nested-keys($z-layers, $layers...) {\n    @warn \"No layer defined for `#{inspect($layers...)}` in $z-layers map. Check variables.scss, property omitted.\";\n  }\n  @return map-deep-get($z-layers, $layers...);\n}\n\n// Box-shadow\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n$box-shadow: (\n  \"modal\": 0 8px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6),\n  \"composer\": 0 -1px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12),\n  \"menu-panel\": 0 12px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15),\n  \"card\": 0 4px 14px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15),\n  \"dropdown\": 0 2px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),\n  \"header\": 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25),\n  \"footer-nav\": 0 0 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25),\n  \"kbd\": (\n    0 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),\n    0 0 0 1px dark-light-choose(#fff, #000) inset\n  ),\n  \"focus\": 0 0 6px 0 $tertiary,\n  \"focus-danger\": 0 0 6px 0 $danger\n);\n\n@function shadow($key) {\n  @return map-get($box-shadow, $key);\n}\n\n// Color utilities\n// --------------------------------------------------\n\n// w3c definition of color brightness https://www.w3.org/TR/AERT#color-contrast\n@function dc-color-brightness($color) {\n  @return (\n    (red($color) * 0.299) + (green($color) * 0.587) + (blue($color) * 0.114)\n  );\n}\n\n// Uses an approximation of sRGB blending, GAMMA=2 instead of GAMMA=2.2\n@function srgb-scale($foreground, $background, $percent) {\n  $ratio: ($percent / 100%);\n  $iratio: 1 - $ratio;\n  $f_r2: red($foreground) * red($foreground);\n  $f_g2: green($foreground) * green($foreground);\n  $f_b2: blue($foreground) * blue($foreground);\n  $b_r2: red($background) * red($background);\n  $b_g2: green($background) * green($background);\n  $b_b2: blue($background) * blue($background);\n  $r_r2: $f_r2 * $ratio + $b_r2 * $iratio;\n  $r_g2: $f_g2 * $ratio + $b_g2 * $iratio;\n  $r_b2: $f_b2 * $ratio + $b_b2 * $iratio;\n  $r_r: sqrt($r_r2);\n  $r_g: sqrt($r_g2);\n  $r_b: sqrt($r_b2);\n  @return rgb($r_r, $r_g, $r_b);\n}\n\n// Replaces dark-light-diff($primary, $secondary, 50%, -50%)\n@function blend-primary-secondary($percent) {\n  @return srgb-scale($primary, $secondary, $percent);\n}\n\n@function dark-light-diff(\n  $adjusted-color,\n  $comparison-color,\n  $lightness,\n  $darkness\n) {\n  @if dc-color-brightness($adjusted-color) <\n    dc-color-brightness($comparison-color)\n  {\n    @return scale-color($adjusted-color, $lightness: $lightness);\n  } @else {\n    @return scale-color($adjusted-color, $lightness: $darkness);\n  }\n}\n@function dark-light-choose($light-theme-result, $dark-theme-result) {\n  @if is-light-color-scheme() {\n    @return $light-theme-result;\n  } @else {\n    @return $dark-theme-result;\n  }\n}\n\n@function is-light-color-scheme() {\n  @if dc-color-brightness($primary) < dc-color-brightness($secondary) {\n    @return true;\n  } @else {\n    @return false;\n  }\n}\n\n@function is-dark-color-scheme() {\n  @return not is-light-color-scheme();\n}\n\n@import \"color_transformations\";\n",

		"/* Magnific Popup CSS */\n\n////////////////////////\n//\n// Contents:\n//\n// 1. Default Settings\n// 2.
